entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:29 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: S 15 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
